title: Google Analytics ending support for Universal Analytics in 2023 after over a decade
content:
Analytics are a key part of running any website, and Google Analytics has been a favorite for many thanks to its powerful tools and relatively easy setup. Now, after more than a decade, Google Analytics is pulling the plug on Universal Analytics as it shifts to a new standard.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Analytics ending support for Universal Analytics in 2023 after over a decade appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After over a decade, Google is pulling the plug on the industry standard known as Universal Analytics to make way for its replacement.
